•	Peru, Equatorial Guinea and Wheatstone LNG  
•	Abu Dhabi’s National Gas Company (GASCO) 
•	Abu Dhabi’s National Oil Refining Company (TAKREER) 
•	Saudi Sadara Chemical Project (Alliance between Saudi Aramco and DOW Chemical) 

My responsibility was to manage accounts/projects from clients’ first interest till close-out including engineering and design services (FEED), technical/commercial bid preparation, technical clarifications, commercial/contractual negotiations, equipment supply, installation, and commissioning.

I was fully responsible for my account’s/project’s financial result, management, and organisation: sales, engineering, procurement & contracting, expediting, inspection, packing, logistics, installation, and commissioning incl. HSE up to 33 staff. I reported to the General Manager, Financial Manager, and Managing Director of the company. 

As a result of my accounts and projects the company transitioned from an equipment supplier to an engineering and design specialist and system integrator, being single source consultant to 
•	Multiple LNG clients (3 projects) 
•	Abu Dhabi’s National Gas Company (3 projects) 
•	Abu Dhabi’s National Oil Refining Company (6 projects) 
•	Saudi Sadara Chemical Company (1 project)
and acquired and executed 12/13 projects. 

I gradually increased efficiency and added value by better sourcing, increasing buying power, setting new company standards, and work methods.
